      • Question

        public Question(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String body,
                java.lang.String authorId)
        Constructor for creating brand new, unsubmitted Question.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the question.
        body - The main text content of the question; handled by Superclass Content.
        authorId - A unique identifier to the user who authored the question; handled by Superclass Content.

      • getAnswerById

        public Answer getAnswerById(java.lang.String aid)
        Gets a specific answer from within the question by id.
        Returns:
        On success, the answer specified by given index. On failure, null if answer not found.
